mil3.3.1:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.3.1:0.3_0: and seeking alms in suitable places.
mil3.3.1:1.2_0: “While staying in the past, what’s the root of the tree? What’s the root of the past? What’s the root of root of roots?”
mil3.3.1:1.3_0: “Great king, in the future, future, and present, both the root and ignorance are root of ignorance.
mil3.3.1:1.4_0: Choices are a condition for consciousness. Consciousness is a condition for name and form. Name and form are conditions for the six sense fields. The six sense fields are conditions for contact. Contact is a condition for feeling. Feeling is a condition for craving. Craving is a condition for grasping. Grasping is a condition for continued existence. Continued existence is a condition for rebirth. Rebirth is a condition for old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress to come to be.
mil3.3.1:1.5_0: This is how there is the end of this whole mass of suffering.”
mil3.3.1:3.1_0: While traveling along the road is finished.
